description: Goh`s Murkrow was pointed out in the nearby tree where he was sitting at at town in the Johto region where night had permanently fallen. It was feeling a little sad because everyone thought it was bad luck to see Murkrow like it at night and many people abhor the sight of them. Goh noticed it wasn`t doing well and asked if it wanted to come with him. It agreed and Goh caught it.
name: Yamikarasu (Gou)
